home.title: Serving Quran is our greatest Ghayah
home.description: We are building the largest community for developing the Quranic technology
home.description2: and improving the user experience for Muslims around the world

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Open source technical projects to enrich the technology available to developers in the field of Quranic technologies
projects.headline: Open source technical projects to enrich the technology available to developers in the field of Quranic technologies. Any developer or researcher can participate, develop, or benefit from them.

quranAppsDirectory.title: Quran Apps Directory
quranAppsDirectory.shortDescription: Objective: To serve Muslims worldwide by providing a platform to collect and categorize digital applications related to the Quran. The project aims to facilitate access to the best technological solutions that support the Book of Allah, including reading, recitation, memorization, interpretation, Tajweed, and other Quranic fields.
quranAppsDirectory.roles: Technical Development, UI/UX Design, Research and Data Collection, Sharia Specialists to ensure the accuracy of the applications.

advancedSearch.title: Advanced Quran Search Technology
advancedSearch.shortDescription: A project aimed at developing advanced search technologies in the Quranic text, to facilitate access to verses and Quranic information with high accuracy and speed.
advancedSearch.roles: Technical Development, Research and Data Collection, Sharia Specialists.

quranContentManagementSystem.title: Quran Content Management System
quranContentManagementSystem.shortDescription: A project aimed at developing a content management system for the Quranic text, to facilitate access to verses and Quranic information with high accuracy and speed.
quranContentManagementSystem.roles: Technical Development, Research and Data Collection, Sharia Specialists.

1.title: Quran Apps Directory
1.subtitle: Objective: To serve Muslims worldwide by providing a platform to collect and categorize digital applications related to the Quran. The project aims to facilitate access to the best technological solutions that support the Book of Allah, including reading, recitation, memorization, interpretation, Tajweed, and other Quranic fields.
1.description: Objective: To serve Muslims worldwide by providing a platform to collect and categorize digital applications related to the Quran. The project aims to facilitate access to the best technological solutions that support the Book of Allah, including reading, recitation, memorization, interpretation, Tajweed, and other Quranic fields.

importanceItems.1: Simplifying Access: Providing easy access to the most important Quranic applications across various fields.
importanceItems.2: Enhanced Searchability: Facilitating the search for applications that meet user needs.
importanceItems.3: Seamless Sharing: Creating an easy mechanism for sharing Quranic applications.

rolesItems.1: Technical Development: Building and maintaining the platform's infrastructure.
rolesItems.2: UI/UX Design: Designing user interfaces and optimizing the user experience.
rolesItems.3: Research and Data Collection: Identifying, gathering, and classifying relevant applications.
rolesItems.4: Sharia Specialists: Ensuring the accuracy and authenticity of the Quranic content.

2.title: Quranic Advanced Search Technology
2.subtitle: The project aims to develop an innovative and advanced search technology that enables users to access Qur'anic texts quickly and accurately. By leveraging artificial intelligence and advanced search algorithms, it enhances the search experience and supports researchers and developers in analyzing Qur'anic texts.
2.description: The project aims to create and develop open-source tools that enable word-matching search and semantic search, allowing users to find content based on the intended meaning by understanding context, word roots, meanings, and similar verses. This initiative contributes to enhancing the understanding of the Qur'an, supporting researchers, and assisting memorizers, ultimately making Qur'anic applications more effective and interactive.

importanceItems.1: Provides accurate and advanced search capabilities that can be customized to meet user needs.
importanceItems.2: Helps researchers easily access texts and rulings.
importanceItems.3: Supports Qur'anic applications with modern technological solutions to enhance search functionalities.

rolesItems.1: AI Developers to design and improve search algorithms.
rolesItems.2: Shariah Specialists to ensure the accuracy of texts and search results.

3.title: Quran Content Management System
3.subtitle: The project aims to build an integrated system for managing Quranic content that enables users to access Quranic resources easily and effectively. It provides a centralized platform for Quranic resources such as Tafsir, Quranic texts, and software libraries, with built-in mechanisms for managing updates and intellectual property rights.
3.description: The project aims to build an integrated system for managing Quranic content that enables users to access Quranic resources easily and effectively. It provides a centralized platform for Quranic resources such as Tafsir, Quranic texts, and software libraries, with built-in mechanisms for managing updates and intellectual property rights.

importanceItems.1: Facilitating the sharing of Quranic resources with developers.
importanceItems.2: Facilitating access to updates related to Quranic content.
importanceItems.3: Standardizing the formatting of Quranic resources to ease their utilization in developing Quranic applications.

rolesItems.1: Technical Development: Building and maintaining the platform's infrastructure.
rolesItems.2: UI/UX Design: Designing user interfaces and optimizing the user experience.
rolesItems.3: Research and Data Collection: Identifying, gathering, and classifying relevant data and resources.

mushafFonts.description: Quran fonts compatible with various devices, including handcrafted letter-based fonts and standard Unicode text fonts

digitalMushaf.description: Quran pages exactly similar to the printed mushaf, precise design helps in Quran memorization, providing a familiar experience.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: What others ask about the community

join.title: Why would I want to join the Itqan community?
join.answer: The Itqan community is a great place to be surrounded by passionate developers who are looking to develop their skills and serve a greater faith-based purpose. Through connecting with like-minded others, and getting feedback on your work and software.

support.title: Will I get professional support?
support.answer: Yes, you'll have access to the community discussion board to get feedback, review your software, and learn from others.

topics.title: What topics can I ask about here?
topics.answer: The Itqan community is dedicated to professional and amateur programmers. The best questions in our community usually contain a portion of source code, but if your question covers a specific programming problem, programming algorithm, or commonly used programming tools; and is a practical, answerable, unique problem in software development, you're in the right place to ask what's on your mind.

community.title: Is Itqan Community Right for You?
community.subtitle1: Itqan Digital Communities will be great

blog.headline1: Itqan Library is your #1 assistant for developing outstanding Quranic apps
blog.headline2: We provide digital and technical resources for open source use

opensourceLicense.title: Publishing Licenses
opensourceLicense.subtitle: Analysis results of open source software licenses for the Itqan community
opensourceLicense.description: A comprehensive guide to publishing licenses and their crucial role in the development of Quranic technologies, including detailed analysis of different license types and their implications for the community.
opensourceLicense.author: Itqan Team

comparison.title: License Comparison
comparison.content: A detailed comparison of available licenses and their specific uses for different types of projects.

challenges.title: Challenges of Current Licenses
challenges.content: Current licenses face various challenges in addressing modern concerns like AI usage and commercial exploitation.

keyPoints.1: Copyleft licenses require modifications to remain open source
keyPoints.2: Permissive licenses allow broader use including commercial applications
keyPoints.3: Current licenses lack comprehensive AI/ML usage restrictions
keyPoints.4: MIT License is recommended for maximizing distribution and collaboration

opensourceLicense.conclusion: Based on our findings, we recommend adopting the MIT License for any content or software published within the community. The MIT License is a flexible option that promotes distribution and collaboration, while imposing fewer restrictions regarding commercial use and AI.

developmentGuide.title: Your Guide to Develop Quranic Applications
developmentGuide.subtitle: Analysis results of open source software licenses for the Itqan community
developmentGuide.description: Developing Quranic applications is a unique challenge where multiple fields intersect. This guide has been prepared to serve as a mentor and assistant for those interested in establishing distinguished Quranic applications, through practical guidelines that matter and help developers and founders build impactful and sustainable Quranic applications.
developmentGuide.author: Itqan Team

whatOffers.title: What does the guide offer?
whatOffers.content: The guide covers instructions to help you with building and evaluating your Quranic app idea, developing your own work model and standards, and more.

howToBenefit.title: How can I benefit from the guide?
howToBenefit.content: Use the guide as a mentor to transform your ideas into actionable plans and achieve long-term impact.

keyPoints.1: Building and evaluating your Quranic app idea
keyPoints.2: Developing your own work model and standards
keyPoints.3: Maturing your vision regarding implementation and growth
keyPoints.4: Building the founding team for your project

developmentGuide.conclusion: Download the guide now and turn your ideas into an outstanding reality.

evaluationGuide.title: The Guidebook for Evaluating Emerging Quranic Technology Projects
evaluationGuide.subtitle: Analysis results of open source software licenses for the Itqan community
evaluationGuide.description: In the era of technological innovation, this guide represents a unique tool for anyone seeking to evaluate emerging Quranic tech projects or assess their own project. It offers a clear and robust evaluation methodology that assists both evaluators and project owners in conducting an accurate assessment of the quality of these projects and ensuring the sustainability of their impact.
evaluationGuide.author: Itqan Team

contents.title: Contents of the Guide
contents.content: The guide includes an objective evaluation matrix based on a precise analytical approach, along with detailed evaluation criteria and axes.

howToUse.title: How to Make Use of This Guide?
howToUse.content: Rely on it as a comprehensive reference for objective and accurate project evaluation.

keyPoints.1: Originality of the idea and its ability to meet current and future needs
keyPoints.2: Team competence and the integration of roles and expertise
keyPoints.3: Maturity of the prototype, readiness for implementation, and practical suitability
keyPoints.4: Project sustainability and the quality of work and growth plans

evaluationGuide.conclusion: Towards promising Quranic tech projects. Download the guide now.

suraApi.title: Sura API
suraApi.description: This API offers comprehensive access to the content of the Surah application, enabling developers to seamlessly integrate Quranic data into their applications. It allows for the retrieval of detailed information about various projects, including content specific to surahs, pages, and verses, whether by individual number or multiple ranges. The API also facilitates access to word data, including word images, making it a powerful tool for developers aiming to create content-rich Quranic applications.
suraApi.author: Tafsir Center for Qur'anic Studies

devPlatform.title: King Fahd Glorious Qur'an Printing Complex: Developers Platform
devPlatform.description: The King Fahd Glorious Qur'an Printing Complex offers a specialized platform for developers, providing advanced digital resources and tools to facilitate the integration of Holy Qur'an content into various applications and software. This platform includes high-quality digital copies of Mus'haf al-Madinah in vector format, ideal for printing, software development, and educational systems.It also supplies Unicode Uthmanic Fonts supporting various narrations (such as Hafs, Warsh, Shu'bah, Qaloun, Duri, and Susi), ensuring accurate and aesthetic display of Quranic text on smart devices and digital platforms. Additionally, the platform provides comprehensive databases with detailed information for each verse, including jozz number, surah name, page number, and verse text in multiple formats. Developers can also access trusted resources like Tafseer Muyassar and Muyassar of Ghareeb Al-Quran, along with versatile tools in formats like Excel, JSON, and PDF, all aimed at enriching digital Quranic content and fostering innovation in Qur'an-related applications.
devPlatform.author: King Fahd Glorious Qur'an Printing Complex

mushafs.title: Mushafs

mushafMadinah.title: Digital copy of Mus'haf al-Madinah
mushafMadinah.description: A digital version of the Madinah Mushaf, where the Quranic text has been converted into pure digital content by producing the entire Madinah Mushaf as digital files using advanced vector graphics. This technology allows the creation of digital images with unlimited quality and high precision in two-dimensional display data.

unicodeUthmanicFonts.title: Unicode Uthmanic Fonts
unicodeUthmanicFonts.description: A computer font specifically designed for displaying Quranic text in accordance with the Uthmani script. It was built to comply with the Unicode global standard, which is a universal system that enables data to transfer across different systems and devices without any concern of being displayed in a corrupted manner.

mushafs.author: King Fahd Glorious Qur'an Printing Complex

unicodeUthmanicFonts.title: Unicode Uthmanic Fonts
unicodeUthmanicFonts.description: A computer font specifically designed for displaying Quranic text in accordance with the Uthmani script. It was built to comply with the Unicode global standard, which is a universal system that enables data to transfer across different systems and devices without any concern of being displayed in a corrupted manner.
unicodeUthmanicFonts.author: King Fahd Glorious Qur'an Printing Complex

quranicVocabulary.title: Qur'anic Vocabulary Meanings
quranicVocabulary.description: This file contains an explanation of the meanings of Quranic vocabulary and the interpretation of its verses, organized by surah and verse. This explanation aims to simplify the understanding of the Quranic text by clarifying the connotations of words and illustrating their linguistic and legal contexts. The file provides deep insights into the fundamental Quranic concepts, with a focus on interpretive aspects that help the reader grasp the Quranic intentions.

tafsirIbnKathir.title: Tafsir Ibn Kathir
tafsirIbnKathir.description: This file contains the interpretation of the Noble Quran (Tafsir Ibn Kathir), divided by surahs and verses, and is based on the Dar Ibn Al-Jawzi edition.

tafsirSaadi.title: Tafsir As-Saadi
tafsirSaadi.description: This file contains the interpretation of Sheikh Abd al-Rahman al-Sa'di, divided by surahs and verses. It is based on the Dar Ibn al-Jawzi edition.

tafsirMukhtasar.title: Tafsir Al-Mukhtasar
tafsirMukhtasar.description:
Tafsir Al-Mukhtasar with Maqasid (7th edition), this book stands out due to its:

1- Clarity and simplicity of expression, avoiding verbose and complex language.
2- Focus solely on interpreting verses and clarifying their meanings, without delving into issues of recitations, grammar, jurisprudence, and similar topics.
3- Explanation of Quranic vocabulary within the interpretation itself.
4- Adherence to the methodology of the early Muslim predecessors, following what the Quran and Sunnah indicate.

translations.title: Quran Encyclopedia Translations
translations.description:
Quran encyclopedia features trustworthy translations of the meanings and exegeses of the noble Qur'an in many world languages. These renditions have been prepared by reliable translators under the careful supervision of specialized bodies. They are both accessible and shareable on social media.

Objectives:

1. Creating a free electronic reference of the exegeses and translations of the meanings of the noble Qur'an, following the methodology of Ahl-us-Sunnah wal-Jamaa`ah; to replace the unreliable references currently available on the Internet.

2. Providing a variety of electronic versions of the, translations, exegeses, and other related information that can be used on smart devices, applications, and systems.

3. Giving free and easy access to authentic translations and exegeses through search engines and global sources of information.

4. Developing the exegeses and translations by involving specialists and concerned individual in the revision, assessment, and correction of the translations of and information related to Qur'anic verses using electronic assessment and correction systems.
translations.author: The Noble Qur'an Encyclopedia

quranicDataset.title: Quranic Dataset for Text Processing
quranicDataset.description:
This dataset aims to provide a comprehensive and computationally accessible linguistic resource for Classical Arabic. It addresses the critical need for structured and in-depth data for studying and analyzing Quranic text.

The dataset consists of three integrated layers:

1- Orthographic layer: Includes standard and Uthmani Quranic script, along with texts, phonetic transcription, English translation, and dual indexing.

2- Morphological layer: Features precise part-of-speech tagging, detailed morphological and grammatical properties, and information about roots and original words.

3- Syntactic layer: Provides the first complete, computationally processable syntactic encoding of the entire Quran, using a new hybrid framework combining structural and dependency syntax.
quranicDataset.author: Noor Bayan

ahkamTajweed.title: Ahkam Al-Tajweed - Ahmed Al-Tawil
ahkamTajweed.description: A comprehensive and accessible reference for learning and applying Tajweed rules for the Holy Quran. It features a unique organization by surahs and verses, making it easy to connect theoretical rules directly to practical application on the Mushaf. The book aims to simplify Tajweed rules for various levels and is an excellent training tool for improving recitation and perfecting the articulation and characteristics of letters.
ahkamTajweed.author: Ahmed Al-Tawil

mp3Quran.title: MP3 Quran
mp3Quran.description: The library provides comprehensive access to diverse Quranic resources. This interface allows Browse lists of languages, surahs, narrations (rewayat), and reciters, in addition to detailed information about surahs, types of mushafs, and videos. It also offers access to the latest recitations and videos, as well as live broadcasts of Makkah and Madinah channels. Furthermore, the interface includes features for retrieving tafsir (exegesis) links, tadabbur (contemplation), and verse timings, making it a powerful tool for integrating Quranic content into various applications and websites.
mp3Quran.author: Quran Audio Library

quranTests.title: Verses Divided for Easy, Medium, and Hard Tests
quranTests.description: This table provides organized data for Quranic verses, specifically categorized for testing and memorization assessment, indicating the difficulty level for each verse (easy, medium, hard). The table includes essential information for each verse such as: the verse text, its original number, cumulative order (ascending and descending), and surah number. It also provides additional fields for specifying the part, page, and line numbers, making it easy to reference the Mushaf. This structured data allows users to design diverse and effective memorization tests tailored to different levels and abilities.
quranTests.author: Quran Encyclopedia
